about_the_game:
Project Hoyrá

Project Hoyrá is a narrative Action-Adventure game taking place in a new mature fantasy universe in third-person view, with a realistic art direction.

Main Storyline



Within this brand new world, a mysterious cataclysm has decimated most of the O'Navlás, who were living as thriving civilizations. Each O'Navlá civlization manipulated an element of nature: thunder, ice, plants, fire, and many more. The magnificent jungles of Hoyrá now harbor old ruins and some devastated lands that showcase the destruction of the past.

This major event led to the emergence of a new human civilization whose people are called the Natarës. These don’t have powers and most of them are extremely hostile towards the last O’Navlás for an unknown reason.
In this post-apocalyptic context, element manipulators hailing from extinct civilizations are trying to investigate past events while a new global threat emerges, which could mean the definitive end of Hoyrá if past mysteries are not unveiled to stop the past from repeating itself.

You will play as Elduin, a young Water O’Navlá, and will try to solve the puzzle. Accompanied by a mysterious partner, you may find out he’s not the last of his kind. Immerse yourself in a journey full of twists that will challenge you emotionally.

Demo Storyline



The playable demo of Project Hoyrá will offer a part of one of the full game’s chapters, the fourth chapter titled ”Alierra” that takes place after the first third of the main storyline.

After having left everything he knew in order to look for his people, Elduin visits the region of Alierra and goes looking for the Yocotlalis, the majestic Earth O’Navlás that inhabit this region of Hoyrá. They are known for having miraculously survived the great cataclysm that proved itself fatal to all the other element manipulators' civilizations.
On his quest for answers regarding the past, Elduin will discover he’s probably not the only one that came to Alierra.

Game Pillars



The playable demo of Project Hoyrá will have a strong emphasis on its story, its mature narration, its rich and mysterious universe as well as the unexpected course of events throughout the experience.
Above anything, it’s mainly a journey that awaits you when you will go after the mysteries that fill the iconic region of Alierra and the Yocotlalis, the Earth O’Navlás populating the area.

Discover the riches of this world, but be careful about its omnipresent dangers. This great lush jungle is home to numerous predators that won’t hesitate to go after Elduin during his quest. Nature having reclaimed its rights, you will have to be particularly cautious on every path you will take; stay alert at all times.

By playing as Elduin, you will control the precious power of the Water O’Navlás during this demo. Adapt your gameplay as you see fit in order to manipulate this element at your advantage. Opt for ranged combat through your different attack and defense water spells, or use your dagger to adopt a melee combat style.

A Next-Gen Game



The playable demo of Project Hoyrá aims at showcasing the ambition of the full game and intends to be a "Next Gen" experience, being developed on Unreal Engine 5.

The goal: Being Published

Here at PrismaStone Studio, we are a team of about fifteen volunteers currently living for this passion, and hoping to live off of it tomorrow.
The goal of this demo -that shows only one face of Hoyrá’s adventure- is for us to present a condensed version of the full game, including narration, adventure, exploration, combat, gameplay, etc.

We wish to offer this demo to all players, to our community, but also to publishers, in order to try and get finances for the full production of Project Hoyrá, and to make a living out of it.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence, Mature themes, General Mature Content

short_description: Project Hoyrá is a Narrative Action-Adventure game in third-person view taking place in a brand new post-apocalyptic fantasy world. In the demo you will play as Elduin, controlling the water element, to try and find a lost civilization supposed to be the last remaining elemental nation.
